Class CStartupScreen

java.lang.Object

      javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas
          projectpossibility.CStartupScreen

public class CStartupScreen
extends javax.microedition.lcdui.Canvas

The initial splash screen that is displayed when AudioGuardian starts up. Gives users the option to either start the program or exit.
